Title: Zhu's Despair
Description:
Hmm... Is that Yi-Mo kid over there?

<Ken-Ken squints against the increasing torrents of rain.>

It is! He's at the well, and he's not lookin' so good.

Ken-Ken got a bad feeling about this...
ObjectivesText: Exorcise the Sha of Despair energy from Yi-Mo Longbrow in Zhu's Watch.
RewardText:
We did some good work here today, $p.

Monastery always tell us to leave a place better than we find it.
